attributes.action: Improve education and support of LGBTQ+ in schools
attributes.additional_details: Schools and colleges can do more to make sure that students feel open and comfortable to be who they are without risk of bullying or homophobic abuse.
attributes.background: I want to make a difference within schools to ensure that all pupils feel comfortable with who they are and not be afraid of it. 52% of LGBTQ+  (Lesbian , Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, queer,) .Three in four LGBTQ+ pupils have never learned about gender identity or what 'transgender' means.
